DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , parallel-arm clinical trial design study efficacy safety `` Electronic Acupuncture Shoes '' treatment chronic low back pain patient . Chronic low back pain patient , age 20-60 , gender recruit . As primary outcome measure ass efficacy , `` 0-10 numerical rating scale '' use . Secondary outcome measure include speed pain-relief . The number sample experimental group control group ratio 1 : 1 , expect total effective sample number 60 . Experimental group receive six-week `` Electronic Acupuncture Shoes '' treatment week back clinic three time , subject total 18 treatment , course one hour . Subjects take NSAID placebo first week course treatment . After second week NSAID placebo disable . Control subject also accept six- week treatment , control subject equally back clinic three time week , group give subject one hour shoe pseudo electrotherapy treatment group control group run enter test day first week course , take ibuprofen 400mg , take three time day , second week NSAID drug disable .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Electronic Acupuncture Shoes : A Clinical Trial Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: A . Diagnosed chronic low back pain ( pain persist 12 week ) . B . Subjects agree involve signed agreement , explain investigator . A . Diagnosed cancer . B . Early menopause ( age 50 ) . C. Ovariectomized D. Under steroid therapy E. Rheumatoid arthritis F. With fracture undergo back surgery . G. Compression syndrome : e.g . HIVD ( Herniated Intervertebral Disc ) , spinal disorder . H. Renal calculus . I . Pacemaker user . J . Pregnant woman woman expect pregnant . K. Visual impairment . L. Diabetes . M. Visceral infection , e.g . pancreatitis , nephritis . N. Under clinical trial ( medication give treatment ) within 30 day . O. Contraindications ibuprofen . P. Poor function heart , liver , GI tract kidney . Q . Be suspect doctor potential illness , disease reason , may endanger subject .
